articles.title: Paris shooting suspect expressed 'hatred of foreigners', says prosecutor - Reuters
articles.description: The suspect detained over the killing of three Kurdish people in Paris told investigators of his "hatred of foreigners", the Paris prosecutor said on Sund…
articles.content:
PARIS, Dec 25 (Reuters) - The suspect detained over the killing of three Kurdish people in Paris told investigators of his "hatred of foreigners", the Paris prosecutor said on Sunday.
